dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum priuilegio." Latin text on verso with caption title: Taurica Chersonesus; signature XXIX. From: Atlas sive cosmographicae meditationes de fabrica mundi et fabricati figura. Duisburgi Cliuorum : Sumptibus hæredum Gerardi Mercatoris Rupelmundani, 1595.
